title: Secrets of Submission
description: Marcus Allen's gaze immediately honed in on the voluptuous, auburn-haired beauty across from him. Her shapely curves begged for his touch, and her obvious submissive side called to his Dominant one. He wants to command her, control her, and show her all the secrets of submission.Penny Stephens stood nervously at the vanilla potluck, feeling entirely out of her element. Especially when she sensed the constant stare of the gorgeous man on the other side of the room. His dark, heated glances warmed her in a way she'd never felt. Before she knows it, she's submitting to all her illicit desires.Soon, though, someone from Marcus' past begins playing a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse, one that could put Penny's life on the line. When the stakes are raised, will Marcus be able to save her?
author: L.K. Shaw
